text: @RashidaTlaib @AyannaPressley @BLeeForCongress Sure let convicted criminals out, that way they be part of the riots, get shot by white police fleeing another crime they committed or become part of the homeless population. Great plan! Whose to say they won’t get COVID19 once they’re out?
